title: Muggie Ramadani

Anyone knows this serif?

author: ravel

comments.content:
Hi, I used Melior and Galaxie Polaris when I created the identity for Teedot.  
Check it out on my behance portfolio: [www.behance.net/muggieramadani](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201101208/http:/www.behance.net/muggieramadani "www.behance.net/muggieramadani")

Cheers  
Muggie
